title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Cowboys win over the Eagles on Monday night and why they are going to be considered "overrated" by the end of the season. He explains how the Steelers missed their chance at a succession plan for Ben Roethlisberger and where they could have learned from other NFL teams who were in the same position. He reveals his Herd Hierarchy after week 3 of the NFL season. Former NFL QB David Carr joins the show to provide insight on the relationship between his brother Derek Carr and Jon Gruden after their 3-0 start to the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
